mapper.sql: task_id, task_name, bill_no, customerid, start_time, end_time, task_type, task_state, progress, file_path, param1, param2, param3, param4, param5, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from file_export_task where 1=1 and del_flag = '0'
order by create_time desc
